caller_intent: The caller wants to correct the certificate holder information on a Certificate of Insurance (COI) provided by a contractor.
resolution_steps: Gloria acknowledges the caller's request to update the COI's certificate holder information.
Instructs the caller to email the COI they received along with a sample of the correct format.
Gloria will send the corrected COI via email after receiving the documents.
knowledge_required: Understanding Certificate of Insurance (COI) correction processes
summary: A caller requests assistance correcting a COI's certificate holder information. Gloria guides them to email the existing COI and a sample of the correct format. The caller agrees to send the documents via email, and the call concludes with mutual gratitude.
